00063 class KVIRC_API KviMainWindow : public KviTalMainWindow //, public KviIrcContextManager
00064 {
00065         friend class KviWindow;
00066         friend class KviConsoleWindow;
00067         friend class KviApplication;
00068         friend class KviIrcServerParser;
00069         friend class KviMexToolBar;
00070         friend class KviMdiManager;
00071         friend class KviIrcContext;
00072         friend class KviIrcConnection;
00073         friend class KviLagMeter;
00074         friend class KviUserListView;
00075         friend class KviUserListViewArea;
00076         Q_OBJECT
00077 public:
00078         KviMainWindow();
00079         ~KviMainWindow();
00080 protected:
00081         // subwindows
00082         QSplitter                             * m_pSplitter;                     // the frame is splitted vertically and thus can host widgets
00083         KviMenuBar                            * m_pMenuBar;                      // the main menu bar
00084         KviMdiManager                         * m_pMdi;                          // the mdi manager widget (child of the splitter)
00085         KviPointerList<KviMexToolBar>         * m_pModuleExtensionToolBarList;   // the module extension toolbars
00086         KviWindowListBase                     * m_pWindowList;                   // the WindowList
00087         KviStatusBar                          * m_pStatusBar;
00088         // the mdi workspace child windows
00089         KviPointerList<KviWindow>             * m_pWinList;                      // the main list of windows
00090         KviIrcContext                         * m_pActiveContext;                // the context of the m_pActiveWindow
00091         // other
00092         KviTrayIcon                           * m_pTrayIcon;                // the frame's dock extension: this should be prolly moved ?
00093         KviPointerList<QShortcut>             * m_pAccellerators;                // global application accellerators
00094 public:
00095         // the mdi manager: handles mdi children
00096         KviMdiManager * mdiManager(){ return m_pMdi; };
00097         // the splitter is the central widget for this frame
00098         QSplitter * splitter(){ return m_pSplitter; };
00099         // KviWindowListBase is the base class for KviTreeWindowList and the KviClassicWindowList
00100         KviWindowListBase * windowListWidget(){ return m_pWindowList; };
00101         // well.. the menu bar :D
00102         KviMenuBar * mainMenuBar(){ return m_pMenuBar; };
00103         KviStatusBar * mainStatusBar(){ return m_pStatusBar; };
00104         // this function may return 0 if the active window has no irc context
00105         KviIrcContext * activeContext(){ return m_pActiveContext; };
00106         // shortcut to a = activeContext(); return a ? a->connection() : 0
00107         KviIrcConnection * activeConnection();
00108         // The list of the windows belonging to this frame
00109         // Note that the windows may be also undocked, but they are still owned by the frame
00110         KviPointerList<KviWindow> * windowList() { return m_pWinList; };
00111         // Sets the specified window to be the active one
00112         // Raises it and focuses it
00113         void setActiveWindow(KviWindow *wnd);
00114         // Adds a new KviWindow to this frame
00115         // This should be done just after the KviWindow constructor has returned
00116         // If bShow is false then the window is not explicitly shown
00117         // otherwise it is set as active window.
00118         void addWindow(KviWindow *wnd,bool bShow = true); // public for modules
00119         void closeWindow(KviWindow *wnd);
00120         // Checks if a specified window is still existing in this frame child
00121         // window list. This is useful for asynchronous functions
00122         // that keep a window pointer and need to ensure that it is still
00123         // valid after an uncontrolled delay. (Think of a /timer implementation)
00124         bool windowExists(KviWindow * wnd){ return (m_pWinList->findRef(wnd) != -1); };
00125         // The number of consoles in this frame
00126         unsigned int consoleCount();
00127         // Creates a new console window. DON'T use the KviConsoleWindow constructor directly.
00128         // (The script creation events are triggered from here)
00129         KviConsoleWindow * createNewConsole(bool bFirstInFrame = false,bool bShowIt = true);
00130         // Returns the first available console.
00131         // There is almost always an available console.
00132         // Exceptions are the startup and the shutdown (see activeWindow())
00133         KviConsoleWindow * firstConsole();
00134         // Returns the first console that has no connection in progress
00135         // This function CAN return 0 if all the consoles are connected
00136         KviConsoleWindow * firstNotConnectedConsole();
00137         // this is explicitly dedicated to the TrayIcon module
00138         void setTrayIcon(KviTrayIcon * e){ m_pTrayIcon = e; };
00139         // returns the dockExtension applet. Useful for calling refresh() when
00140         // some particular event happens
00141         KviTrayIcon * trayIcon(){ return m_pTrayIcon; };
00142         // helper for saving the window properties
00143         void saveWindowProperties(KviWindow * wnd,const QString &szSection);
00144         // finds the module extension toolbar with the specified identifier
00145         // see KviModuleExtension.h and KviMexToolBar.h
00146         KviMexToolBar * moduleExtensionToolBar(int extensionId);
00147         // Helper to fill the toolbars popup
00148         // it is used by KviToolBar and KviMenuBar
00149         void fillToolBarsPopup(KviTalPopupMenu * p);
00150         void fillIconSizePopup(KviTalPopupMenu * p);
00151         // Set the size of the icons used by the whole app
00152         // Allowed sizes are 16, 22, 32 and 48
00153         void setIconSize(unsigned int uSize);
00154         void setButtonStyle(unsigned int uStyle);
00155         // allows scripts and actions to override builtin accellerators, avoiding ambiguous events
00156         void freeAccelleratorKeySequence(QString & key);
00157 public slots:
00158         void newConsole();
00159         void executeInternalCommand(int index);
00160         void toggleStatusBar();
00161         void customizeToolBars();
00162 protected:
00163         void restoreModuleExtensionToolBars();
00164         void saveModuleExtensionToolBars();
00165         void registerModuleExtensionToolBar(KviMexToolBar * t);
00166         void unregisterModuleExtensionToolBar(KviMexToolBar * t);
00167 
00168         void createWindowList();
00169         void recreateWindowList();
00170 
00171         KviMdiChild * dockWindow(KviWindow *wnd);
00172         void undockWindow(KviWindow *wnd);
00173 
00174         // called by KviWindow
00175         void childWindowCloseRequest(KviWindow *wnd);
00176         void childWindowActivated(KviWindow *wnd, bool bForce = false);
00177 
00178         void childContextStateChange(KviIrcContext * c);
00179         void childConnectionNickNameChange(KviIrcConnection * c);
00180         void childConnectionAwayStateChange(KviIrcConnection * c);
00181         void childConnectionUserModeChange(KviIrcConnection * c);
00182         void childConnectionLagChange(KviIrcConnection * c);
00183         void childConnectionServerInfoChange(KviIrcConnection * c);
00184         void childWindowSelectionStateChange(KviWindow * pWnd,bool bGotSelectionNow);
00185 
00186         virtual void closeEvent(QCloseEvent *e);
00187         virtual void hideEvent(QHideEvent *e);
00188         virtual void resizeEvent(QResizeEvent *e);
00189         virtual void moveEvent(QMoveEvent *e);
00190         virtual bool focusNextPrevChild(bool next);
00191         virtual void changeEvent(QEvent * event);
00192         virtual void contextMenuEvent(QContextMenuEvent * event);
00193 
00194         void updatePseudoTransparency();
00195         void installAccelerators();
00196 protected slots:
00197         void switchToNextWindow();
00198         void switchToPrevWindow();
00199         void switchToNextHighlightedWindow();
00200         void switchToPrevHighlightedWindow();
00201         void switchToNextWindowInContext();
00202         void switchToPrevWindowInContext();
00203 
00204         void maximizeWindow();
00205         void minimizeWindow();
00206 
00207         void accelActivated();
00208         void toolbarsPopupSelected(int id);
00209         void iconSizePopupSelected(QAction * pAction);
00210         void buttonStylePopupSelected(QAction * pAction);
00211 signals:
00212         void activeWindowChanged();       // almost never 0.. but may be
00213         void activeContextChanged();      // may be 0!
00214         void activeContextStateChanged(); // emitted only when the active context is non 0 and it changes state
00215         void activeConnectionNickNameChanged();
00216         void activeConnectionUserModeChanged();
00217         void activeConnectionAwayStateChanged();
00218         void activeConnectionServerInfoChanged();
00219         void activeConnectionLagChanged();
00220         void activeWindowSelectionStateChanged(bool bGotSelectionNow);
00221         void signalMaximizeMdiChildWindow(KviMdiChild * lpC);
00222 protected:
00223         void applyOptions();
00224 private:
00225         void saveToolBarPositions();
00226         void restoreToolBarPositions();
00227 };
